an8.37:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these eight gifts of a good person.
an8.37:1.3: Their gift is pure, good quality, timely, appropriate, intelligent, and regular. While giving their heart is confident, and afterwards they’re uplifted.
an8.37:1.4: These are the eight gifts of a good person.
an8.37:2.1: He gives pure, good quality, and timely gifts
an8.37:2.4: who are fertile fields of merit.
an8.37:4.1: An intelligent person sacrifices like this,
an8.37:4.2: faithful, with a mind of letting go.
an8.37:4.3: Such an astute person is reborn
